thread.title: Scolded for studies, Amity Noida student kills himself
thread.title_full: Scolded for studies, Amity Noida student kills himself - The Times of India

author: Shafaque Alam
title: Scolded for studies, Amity Noida student kills himself
text:
NOIDA: A 16-year-old student of Amity International School in Noida's Sector 44 was found dead in mysterious circumstances in a local green belt on Saturday afternoon.
Bhaskar Vashisth, a resident of Sector 31, was a student of Class XII. Both of Vashisht's parents are cardiologists in a private hospital in Noida.
The boy's body was found in a green belt near Gate No. 3 of the school. He was identified through his belongings. Police said that prima facie he seemed to have consumed some poisonous substance. "No suicide note was recovered from the spot," said a police officer.
Family members said Bhaskar was worried about his studies. "He was stressed about scoring good marks in his class. On Friday, his parents had scolded him over his studies. He left home at night, never to return," a family member said.
